description: Generates a `input` element of type `radio` that is wrapped in a `Label`.

checked.description: Boolean to set radio input, for controlled component

defaultChecked.description: Boolean for how radio input renders initially

isDisabled.description: Prevents radio input from being modified and appears disabled

label.description: Text that describes the radio input

name.description:
String that can be used to identify a set of radio inputs so that only one
    in the set is checked at any given time.

onChange.description: Function that fires when the radio input is clicked
